sentence: I know Elon is just deeply committed to the idea of freedom of expression.? Free speech doesnt necessarily mean good ideas, to be clear,? he added, but to have a robust debate around ideas is how we actually come to reasonable conclusions.? DeSantis vs. Disney The top GOP donor this election cycle, with some $40 million in political contributions, Griffin has also been a big backer of Florida governor Ron DeSantis.
author: Chase Peterson-Withorn
title: Billionaire GOP Megadonor Ken Griffin: I Dont Appreciate Governor DeSantis Going After Disneys Tax Status.
